name: Carrot Fertility
headline: Customized fertility benefits for modern companies.
description: Carrot is a simple and affordable way for companies of any size to build or enhance their fertility benefit. Carrot can help with egg freezing, infertility treatments including in vitro fertilization (IVF), LGBT+ conception, and more. Fertility care is daunting and scary; our focus is on improving the employee experience during high impact moments related to fertility-- helping save time, money and stress.

# Personalized care for every fertility and family-building journey
[Get Carrotarrow_forward](https://www.get-carrot.com/</contact-us>)
# Personalized care for every fertility and family-building journey
[Get Carrotarrow_forward](https://www.get-carrot.com/<#>)
## Comprehensive support and access to care for everyone, everywhere
Millions of members around the world trust Carrot for lifelong access to fertility care and family-building support. 
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6650c95fdb98b33f3843d2ce/668443594fa983f7c2ceb24f_Preservation.avif)Egg, sperm, and embryo freezing](https://www.get-carrot.com/</journey/fertility-preservation>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6650c95fdb98b33f3843d2ce/66844359131e4f42472b9f23_IVF%20and%20IUI.avif)Assisted reproduction (IVF and IUI)](https://www.get-carrot.com/</journey/ivf>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6650c95fdb98b33f3843d2ce/66844359e8b1b4d6e05e6424_GS.avif)Gestational surrogacy](https://www.get-carrot.com/</journey/gestational-surrogacy>)[![Family sitting together](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6650c95fdb98b33f3843d2ce/668443591461922beef93dcd_Adoption%20\(1\).png)Adoption](https://www.get-carrot.com/</journey/adoption>)[![Pregnant couple](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6650c95fdb98b33f3843d2ce/66844359e4b7e454d9c84555_Pregnancy%20and%20ppm.png)Pregnancy and postpartum](https://www.get-carrot.com/</journey/pregnancy>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6650c95fdb98b33f3843d2ce/67928e3ba4d0484d28794652_2-Parenting%20and%20RTW%20\(1\).avif)Parenting and return to work](https://www.get-carrot.com/</journey/parenting-return-to-work>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6650c95fdb98b33f3843d2ce/6684435993df1b97e68207bc_MLT.avif)Menopause and low testosterone](https://www.get-carrot.com/</journey/menopause-low-t>)
[![Wistia video thumbnail](https://embed-ssl.wistia.com/deliveries/0d3c618afaabc7093f6ef12f16064360c4d6b15b.webp?image_crop_resized=640x415)](https://www.get-carrot.com/<https:/embed-ssl.wistia.com/deliveries/b32da4c34ea1c57e89472bddbaabde5aaa17138d.bin>)
## Personalized platform for individual needs
Every fertility and family-building journey is unique. Carrot members receive customized plans based on their individual needs from localized experts, allowing them to experience personalized and culturally competent care.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6650c95fdb98b33f3843d2ce/6780557440d7769aab8ed31f_Carrot.svg)
Carrot provides inclusive support regardless of age, race, income, sex, sexual orientation, gender, faith, marital status, or geography
## Expert care and support around the world
170+ countries, 11,000+ eligible providers, 24/7 expert support. Carrot provides exceptional care across continents and cultures, with language, currency, and payment options to match every member’s need.
[![Wistia video thumbnail](https://embed-ssl.wistia.com/deliveries/89819a5525203bbdf4dd52c53f9caebddd26cd7d.webp?image_crop_resized=640x445)](https://www.get-carrot.com/<https:/embed-ssl.wistia.com/deliveries/4ec7478374759cc8c85a70b73589367a6311b49e.bin>)
## Appropriate care leads to better outcomes
Carrot helps members explore alternatives to IVF like ovulation tracking and nutrition counseling, with 60% of Carrot members opting for less invasive and costly options over IVF.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6650c95fdb98b33f3843d2ce/678fd905edaa0f2df8cb56fd_89-circle-blue.avif)
89% of Carrot members intend to transfer a single embryo instead of multiple embryos after engaging with Carrot, reducing risks of labor complications and NICU admissions.
1
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6650c95fdb98b33f3843d2ce/678fd905dec6601fff12f146_94-substat-blue.avif)
Carrot has the highest single embryo transfer (SET) rate of any fertility benefits provider, with a methodology independently validated by Milliman.
2
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6650c95fdb98b33f3843d2ce/678fd90558e1c4e92610ec36_55-bar-blue.avif)
The Carrot member IVF live birth rate is 55.4%, approximately 24% higher than the national average.
3
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6650c95fdb98b33f3843d2ce/678fd905edaa0f2df8cb56fd_89-circle-blue.avif)
89% of Carrot members intend to transfer a single embryo instead of multiple embryos after engaging with Carrot, reducing risks of labor complications and NICU admissions.
1
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6650c95fdb98b33f3843d2ce/678fd905dec6601fff12f146_94-substat-blue.avif)
Carrot has the highest single embryo transfer (SET) rate of any fertility benefits provider, with a methodology independently validated by Milliman.
2
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6650c95fdb98b33f3843d2ce/678fd90558e1c4e92610ec36_55-bar-blue.avif)
The Carrot member IVF live birth rate is 55.4%, approximately 24% higher than the national average.
3

## Expert care and support around the world
170+ countries, 11,000+ eligible providers, 24/7 expert support. Carrot provides exceptional care across continents and cultures, with language, currency, and payment options to match every member’s need.
![Wistia video thumbnail⟨41⟩](https://www.get-carrot.com/<https:/embed-ssl.wistia.com/deliveries/4ec7478374759cc8c85a70b73589367a6311b49e.bin>)
## Appropriate care leads to better outcomes
Carrot helps members explore alternatives to IVF like ovulation tracking and nutrition counseling, with 60% of Carrot members opting for less invasive and costly options over IVF.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6650c95fdb98b33f3843d2ce/678fd905edaa0f2df8cb56fd_89-circle-blue.avif)
89% of Carrot members intend to transfer a single embryo instead of multiple embryos after engaging with Carrot, reducing risks of labor complications and NICU admissions.

2

generated_description:
**Carrot Fertility: Revolutionizing Fertility Benefits for Modern Workplaces**

Carrot Fertility is on a mission to make fertility benefits accessible and customized for companies of all shapes and sizes. Founded in San Francisco and part of Y Combinator's Spring 2017 cohort, Carrot provides a robust platform that tackles the emotional and financial stresses associated with fertility treatments. It's designed to support employees heading into major life changes with confidence.

**What They Do:**
Carrot offers a wide array of fertility services, including:

- **Egg Freezing**: Allowing employees to take control of their reproductive futures.
- **Infertility Treatments**: Including in vitro fertilization (IVF), intrauterine insemination (IUI), and more.
- **LGBT+ Family Building**: Tailored solutions for diverse family structures.
- **Support Resources**: Covering everything from pregnancy and postpartum care to parenting and return-to-work guidance.

Their platform emphasizes a personalized experience, with culturally competent services available in over 170 countries. Carrot works diligently to streamline the experience for employees, ultimately saving them time, money, and stress during what can be a highly emotional journey.

**Key Features:**
1. **Global Coverage**: Access to care through over 11,000 eligible providers around the world.
2. **Carrot Rx**: A single source for all fertility medication needs.
3. **Carrot Card**: An easy, secure way for members to pay for fertility-related expenses.
4. **Exceptional Support**: 24/7 access to expert assistance to guide members through their journeys.
5. **Statistics-Driven Success**: With a 55.4% live birth rate for IVF—a significant 24% higher than the national average—Carrot backs its offerings with evidence-based results.

**Why It Matters:**
Carrot’s tailored approach not only enhances employee satisfaction but also boosts retention rates. Ninety-five percent of Carrot's members say they would remain with their employer due to the fertility benefits offered. It’s a powerful proposition for companies looking to attract and retain top talent.

**In Summary**:
Carrot Fertility stands out in the burgeoning fertility-tech landscape by removing barriers to care and focusing on a holistic, supportive employee experience. By bridging the gap between individual needs and global healthcare solutions, Carrot is redefining how organizations approach family-building benefits in a modern work environment. For more information, you can check out their website at [Carrot Fertility](https://www.get-carrot.com/).
